resume_parsed.text:
Resume of Sr

Neil

Oracle DBA

hemant.b.aher@gmail.com

PROFILE

A highly result oriented Skilled Oracle DBA certified Professional with extensive experience in Database Administration on Production databases , Unix Administration, good team player, organization with excellent communication skills. I have over 7 years of active experience. I have extensive experience in installation and configuration, system implementation and problem trouble shooting. My experience cut across different organizations, which includes financial, government, healthcare and business systems. I am a detail-oriented professional with extensive customer service experience.

CERTIFICATIONS

Oracle Certified in Oracle Database 10g: Real application Clusters Administration.

Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) in 10g Database Administration.

Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) in 9i Database Administration.

Oracle Certified Associate (OCA) in 9i Database Administration.

Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA)

EDUCATION

Bachelor of Computer Engineering, University of Mumbai, India. June 2001

KEY STRENGTHS

All of my experience & knowledge has been gained across the major Oracle database versions (8i, 9i & 10g) and a wide range of operating systems (MS-Windows 2000, 2003, NT Server, UNIX/Linux, Sun Solaris, HP-UX & AIX). I have been exposed to a wide range of technologies and developed a broad set of technical skills and a very strong background in Oracle Database & flavors of UNIX operating system.

Expertise on database administration for Oracle 10g/9i/8i with experience within very large scale database environment and mission critical production databases.

Experience in 10g Real Application Clusters (RAC) installation with ASM and maintenance of the same on Production environment.

Experience on database upgrade from Oracle 8i to Oracle 9i and eventually to 10g on production environment.

Excellent knowledge of SQL*Plus, SQL*Net, SQL*Loader, Enterprise Manager.

Expertise on database backup/recovery strategy (RMAN, Export/Import & Datapump) on Production environment.

Performance Tuning, Capacity Planning, hot standby databases, database cloning, refresh, and patch management.

Setup oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM) 10g for database monitoring/performance/diagnostics.

Dataguard implementation and maintenance for Disaster Recovery .

Experience in Performance Tuning (I/O, Memory & SQL Tuning etc) by working in development area using STATSPACK and AWR reports as the main tool to tune SQL queries.

Experience in Database migration from 9i to 10g on Production/Development databases.

Liasing with the Offshore DBA team on a regular basis to discuss and resolve the Database related issues

System administration on UNIX.

​ TECHNICAL SKILLS

Operating Systems Sun Solaris 5.8/5.9/5.10, HP- UNIX, IBM AIX, Linux, Windows NT/95/2000, Windows 2000

RDBMS Oracle Server 8i/9i/10g, Oracle 9i/10g RAC

Storage Oracle 10g ASM, Veritas Net backup

Tools SQL*Plus, PL/SQL, SQL*Loader, SQL*Net/Net8, Quest – Toad, Oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM), Export/Import, Datapump, RMAN, UNIX Shell Scripts, Oracle Warehouse Builder 9.2, Business Objects 6.5

Network Protocols TCP/IP, VOIP

Verticals Banking, Finance & Health Care

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Key career contributions as: Oracle DBA – BT Global Services, UK * Oracle DBA – ABN AMRO Bank, India * System Engineer – Trikon Electronics Pvt Ltd, India.

BT Global Services, Leeds /London ,UK ( through Mastek UK Ltd ) March 2005 – July 2009

Oracle DBA

The BT Consulting and System Integrations is the Local Service Provider for the London cluster of NHS Connecting for Health (NPfIT and now CfH) and is responsible for helping the NHS deliver their new Care Records Service across the capital as the part world’s largest investment in Healthcare. Service Management technical team is responsible for all services support functions related to Production/Development Environment.

Technology : Oracle Server 10g & 9i, 10g RAC, Sun Solaris 5.9/5.10, Windows NT/2000/XP, HP/EMC SAN, ASM, Vertias and Solaris Volume Managers, Veritas Netbackup, RMAN, Oracle Enterprise Manager OEM,Quest – Toad, Oracle Warehouse Builder 9.2, Business Objects 6.5, Database
Size: 50GB to 2 TB

Job Responsibilities:

Installation, Configuration and maintenance of Oracle 10g Real Application Cluster (RAC), Load balancing Failover.

Real Application Clusters monitoring, tuning, load balanced using OEM (Oracle Enterprise Manager), Stats pack and V$dynamic views.

CRS/ASM installation and new database creation for 10g Real Application Cluster (RAC).

Design and implementation of database backup strategy and performed full, incremental and Cumulative backups using RMAN. Troubleshooting with RMAN backup problem.

Migrating a Non ASM Single instance Oracle 10g Database to 10g RAC Database configured on ASM.

Optimization and fine-tuning the database by planning storage requirements, building indexes and altering storage clauses for tables and indexes. Monitor and Tuning of Database Performance by using various optimization techniques.

Patched Oracle Database Server 9i and 10g for both Single Instance and multiple nodes of RAC Database using Opatch.

Provide 24/7 monitoring of network and database operations to ensure top operating efficiency. Interacted with Oracle Support for resolving various critical database issues.

Involve in the Capacity Planning for databases based the future business growth requirements.

Provide database administration on production, testing and development database servers. Creation of database objects like tables, indexes, stored procedures and views etc. Creation of users and roles and maintaining system security.

Coordinating with Developers and users connecting to different databases, setting policy and procedures as they relate to database maintenance, Security, backup & Recovery etc.

Estimate Storage requirement, Creation of Tablespaces and other Database Primary Objects.

Clone/Refresh of Production databases to Testing and training environments.

Worked closely with application team members to perform SQL Tuning using Explain Plan, SQL Trace, Optimizer Hints, Statspack, AWR and TKPROF utility.

Administer an Oracle database and its users using Oracle Enterprise Manager.

I have used Oracle 10g Enterprise Manager db console tools such as ADDM, AWR for diagnosing & monitoring events, jobs & performance related problems. Monitored all databases status including CPU, memory, I/O, space Management, block, and dead lock using OEM.

Responsible for 24x7 on-call support.

ABN AMRO Bank, India (through Clover Technologies Pvt Ltd) August2004 – November 2004

Oracle DBA

ABN AMRO Bank is one of the largest Banks in India, with variety of applications & products in Banking Sector.

Technology : Oracle Server 9i & 8i, OEM (Oracle Enterprise Manager), SQL*Plus, PL/SQL, Sun Solaris
5.8, Linux Red Hat 3 & 4.0. Database Size: 20GB to 1 TB.

Job Responsibilities:

Supported and assisted a team of DBA's in migration of databases from Oracle 8i to 9i R2. The role involved in installation, configuration & upgradation of oracle server software on Solaris and windows boxes.

I have applied latest releases of the RDBMS patches from Oracle to the Production and test instances to resolve
few technical challenges & issues.

Setup/configured oracle RMAN for database backup and recovery. Applied different recovery procedures for complete and incomplete recoveries depending on the type of failure by using export/import & o/s scripts like shell & korn scripts.

Tuned databases for memory tuning by adjusting Buffer cache size, log switches and reducing check pointing, increasing sort area sizes, shared pool area, prioritizing oracle processes and increasing SGA overall.

Advised developers using Explain plan, TKprof and identifying the Execution plan in tuning queries, using Indexes, partitioning, hints etc.

Involved in tuning Transaction intensive servers under OLTP situations (I/O bottlenecks, SGA, Pinning objects, Sort space, literal sql, Redo logs).

Performed daily alert log files, trace files check, and general data consistency & data integrity check. Checked the configuration and performance of the existing databases including data file allocation, index, fragmentation and the impact on system performance. Analyzed potential problems (response delay, locking, server down time, etc) and avoided it.

Setup and supported for Oracle 9i/10g HA solutions including RAC, Standby servers, Data Guard.

Developed or modified some Oracle backup and recovery scripts. Used Oracle backup utility RMAN to implement Oracle backup and performed a number of times of disaster recovery.

Created, maintained, and monitored the Standby Database.

Cloned the instances from production to Test, Development instance to test & simulate few technical challenges, coordinate with testing and development teams.

I worked closely and established good relationships with developers, SA's for discussing infrastructure support, recommendations and implementation to resolve development & production issues.

Provided 24x7 on call production support.

Trikon Electronics Pvt. Ltd, India September 2001 – August 2004

System Engineer

Technology : Oracle Server 8i & 9i, Linux, Sun Solaris, SQL plus, TCP/IP, VOIP, Database Size: 20GB to
400 GB.

Job Responsibilities:

Installation of Slackware Linux 8, Kernel Compilation.

Configuration of Routers and Switches and monitoring the network traffic via them.

Installation, Configuration and maintenance of Sendmail the mailing software on Linux.

Installation and Configuration of Apache and Samba Servers on Slackware Linux.

Migrated all client site databases from Oracle versions 8i to 9i Release 2, to support the business requirement of
deploying the new web based product front end.

Clone/Refresh of Production databases to Testing environments.

I was responsible for checking the backup logs to ensure backups were taken, monitoring the alert log and general database housekeeping.

Used oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM) for routine database monitoring.

I implemented STATSPACK at all customer sites to provide base line activity and identify performance issues
and became proficient with wait event analysis (SQL tracing and TKPROF).

Provided first line IT helpdesk support for external customers.

Reference: Available upon Request.
Visa Status: UK Tier1 Visa (General) for Highly Skilled Migrants

Valid till: 7th November 2011.

linkedin.headline: IT Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services

positions.summary: As an IT Analyst, I have been given higher responsibilities and would be trained to take up a lower management role and would be expected to lead teams to successful project completions.
positions.title: IT Analyst

positions.summary: As a system engineer, I worked on various development and proof of concepts projects earning appreciation from peers and my clients. I successfully completed certifications as well.
positions.title: Systems Engineer

linkedin.summary:
Sudha is an adventurous person who is persistent in achieving results and doing what she is passionate about yet she is adaptable to changes.

As part of the current project, she is researching across various industries to find a viable business solution for industries like fleet telematics, retail, airlines, sports, utilities, gaming etc. She is prepared to learn something new and come out with something innovative and sellable. She is termed as a project specialist rather than a developer.

BI has always been a passionate subject for Sudha and she has moved on from a Non-BI industry to a BI industry just so she can pursue her dream career in the field of BI. She not only got special training in certain BI tools but went on to clear certifications (MicroStrategy - CPD, CRD, CDD and MCD) and provided training to other associates across TCS. She has also worked in different BI projects.

She has worked in a variety of projects starting from sap basis to Microstrategy to Tibco Spotfire, to learning backend tools like HANA. Her career started off in Business Objects, just to be caught on by SAP Basis. Moving onto her dream career of BI, she was able to adapt to the various nuances that different BI tools demand and conceptualise and develop various tools across industries with finesse.

recommendations.headline: Founder CEO, at BigMyGig, Passionate Speaker and Visiting Faculty
recommendations.text: Sudha is a very passionate and large hearted person. Give her a task and she'll ensure it's done as a true leader. Perfect at her work and a happy person to have in your team. I strongly recommend her for any team.
recommendations.date-relation: May 18, 2015, Ramalingam worked directly with Sudha at Tata Consultancy Services
recommendations.name: Ramalingam Subramanian

recommendations.headline: Secure Product Life Cycle Engagement Manager at PayPal
recommendations.text: Sudha is a person with great enthusiasm and motivation and likes with good problem solving abilities. This combination along with her hard work will take her places.
recommendations.date-relation: November 24, 2010, Arun advised Sudha at University of Mumbai
recommendations.name: Arun Parthasarathy

recommendations.headline: Training & Placement Officer at SIES GST
recommendations.text: Sudha is one of the best students I have known in my teaching profession. Very reliable, hard working and intelligent person.
recommendations.date-relation: September 24, 2010, Seema taught Sudha at University of Mumbai
recommendations.name: Seema Khan

educations.text: Activities and Societies: Training and Placement Cell

personality.text:
16+ years of experience in software engineering, development, architecture, development methodology / best practices, requirements analysis, data modeling, handling projects and ensuring delivery of projects within the time & cost parameters and developing web and enterprises applications.  Progressed through analytical and applications work to senior management position. Highly effective interpersonal, time management and communication skills. Currently working as architect in Element Fleet projects, developed in depth business and data knowhow of fleet and delivered complex programs. 

Instrumental in working on big data technologies like Datastax Enterprise, Cassandra, Spark, Filodb, Hive, Hadoop and Others.
Enthusiastic in learning new technologies in Open source primarily around ingesting and analyzing data. 
Working on Element projects using technologies like Cassandra, Spark, Filodb, Kafka, Talend and Others.
Designed and developed complex programs for GE fleet using dimensional data model and data computation routines in TeraData.Analyzed performance of applications to pinpoint frequently used inefficiency algorithms.
Experiment with new technologies and routines to increase efficiency and reduce processing / development time.
